name: Guns Sounds (for shooting experts)
description:
Gun sounds is a simulator of real sounds of weapons shots. Here you find panel with guns, to fire gun jus choose it and press shoot button. Each gun have different sounds it is the most realistic simulation shots of weapons. Gun simulator have large collection shots sounds from different types of weapons from pistols, AK-47, shotgun, rifle to tazer gun (electrical) . All CS:GO fans love this app to play with it in real life to prank friend or just have fun in field. Game contains 8 different types of weapons, such as machine guns, machine guns, grenades, pistols, revolvers, as well as sniper rifles and shotguns. These shot sounds are made together with specials, we recorded high quality gun sounds from the best snipers, and army experts. You will find different sounds from the same weapon, including close, far, single shot, etc.

Games, Hunters love our gun sound boar, buttons with weapons shots, shooting sound. Our game includes various of gun types, here can be found weapons such as Barrett 50 Cal, Min Uzi, P90, Vector, M4A1, Famas, shotgun, rifles, automates with their quality HD sounds.

Features:
*Over 8 different and new CS:GO gun sounds
*Make your phone into gun in few click
*Currently featuring many high quality gun sounds and realistic Gun Sounds!
*You can prank you friends with weapon Sounds!
*Pretend to shoot your cat with CS Sounds!
* Real shooting, shot sound
* Recorded by army experts
* Fire your pretend gun!

With our CS:GO gun sound game you can do a lot of fun stuff: scare your friends, prank family, or play with friend cs in field and use your Smartphones as guns. This weapon soundboard you used at your own risk, from the ridiculous to the believable. This app is perfect to use as a prank - from taking revenge on your roommate or causing mass-terror when in a group. Best virtual weapons are ready and you can have it on your phone if you download best weapon app.
